maqras.text: 26|111|geudeul-i daedabhagil gajang mi cheonhan jadeul-i ttaleugo issneun neoleul mid eulan mal-inyo
26|112|geuga malhagil geudeul-i haengha go issneun geos-i mueos-inji aneunba eobs doda
26|113|geudeul-ui gyesan-eun danji junimkkeiss-eum-eul neohuineun algo iss-eulila
26|114|naega midneun jadeul-eul chubanghaneunjaga animyeo
26|115|sillo naneun bunmyeonghan gyeong-gojala
26|116|ittae geudeul-i malhagil noayeonega man-il dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon neo neun dol-e maj-a jugge doelila
26|117|geuga malhagil juyeo jeoui baeg seongdeul-i jeoleul geoyeoghanaida
26|118|jeowa geudeul saileul pangyeolhayeojusigo jeowa deobul-eo midneun jadeul-eul guhayeo jusoseo
26|119|hananim-eun geuwa hamkke jim-eul gadeugsil-eun baee tan jadeul-eul guhayeoss nola
26|120|geuleon hu hananim-eun dwie nam eun jadeul-eul igsake haess-euni
26|121|sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss eoss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hayeossdeola
26|122|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhasim-ila
26|123|adeuui baegseongdo seonjijadeul-eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|124|geudeul-ui hyeongje hudeuga malhagil neohuineun hananim-eul dulyeowo haji anh neunyo
26|125|sillo naega neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
26|126|geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
26|127|geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anihani naui bosang-eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
26|128|neohuineun nop-eun gosmada gongheohanhyanglag-eul wihae geonmul-eul se-uneunyo
26|129|neohuiga yeongsaenghagoja gungjeon eul se-uneunyo
26|130|neohuineun tain-eul gong-gyeogham-e pog guncheoleom gong-gyeoghaessnola
26|131|hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-e ge sunjonghala
26|132|neohuiga algo issneun modeun geos eul jusin bun-eul dulyeowo hala
26|133|geubunkkeseoneun gachugdeulgwa jason deul-eul neohuiege jusyeoss-eumyeo
26|134|nag-wongwa umuldo jusyeossnola
26|135|sillo naneun simpan-ui nal neohui ege naelyeojil beol-i dulyeobdoda
26|136|geudeul-i daedabhagil nega seolgyo hadeun anihadeun uliegeneun machanga jila
26|137|sillo igeos-eun yes seonjodeul-ui gwanseub-e bulgwahamyeo
26|138|ulineun beol-eul badji anihadoda
26|139|ileohge geudeul-i geuleul bujeong hamae hananim-eun geudeul-eul myeolmangsikyeossno la geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hadeola
26|140|sillo geudaeui junim-eun jeonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
26|141|samudeuui baegseong-eun seonjijadeul eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|142|geudeul-ui hyeongje sallega geudeul-ege malhaessdeola hananim-eul dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
26|143|sillo naneun neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
26|144|geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
26|145|geuloinhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anhnani sillo naui bosang-eun man-yuui junim-eulo buteo issnola
26|146|igos-eseo neohuiga soyuhan geosdeul-i neohuiui hyanglag-eul wihae nam-a iss-eulila saeng-gaghaneunyo
26|147|jeong-wongwa saemteoga
26|148|gyeongjagjiwa muleu-ig-eoganeun jong lyeonamuwa
26|149|neohuiga dollo jeong-gyohage se-un jibdeul-i geudaelo anjeonhalila saeng-gagha neunyo
26|150|hananim-eul dulyeowohago naege sunjonghala
26|151|bangtanghan jadeul-ui myeonglyeong-eul ttaleuji malla
26|152|geudeul-eun jisang-eseo saagham-eul haenghal ppun gaeseonhaji anhneun jadeul-ila
26|153|geudeul-i malhagil neoneun masul-egeollyeo issneun ja jung-e hanala
26|154|neoneun uliwa daleulba eobsneun han ingan-e bulgwahani nega jinsilhan ja jung-e issdamyeon geu yejeung-eul daela
26|155|ittae geuga daedabhagil yeogi amkeos-ui nagtaga issnani jeonghayeojin eoneu nal i nagtaga mul-eul masil gwon liga iss-eul geos-iyo geuligo neohuiga mul-eul masil gwonliga iss-eul geos-ila
26|156|geu nagtaleul haechiji malla geu leohji anihamyeon widaehan nal jingbeol-i neohuileul eomseubhalila
26|157|geudeul-eun geu nagtaleul salhaehagoseo huhoehayeoss-euna
26|158|geudeul-ege jingbeol-i naelyeojyeossno la sillo geu an-eneun yejung-i iss-eoss-eu ni geudeul daedasuga midji ani hayeoss deola
26|159|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhasim-ila
26|160|los-ui baegseongdo seonjijadeul-eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|161|geudeul-ui hyeongje los-i geudeul-egemalhaessdeola neohuineun hananim-i dulyeobji anhneunyo
26|162|naneun neohuileul wihan mid-eum-ui seonjijala
26|163|hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
26|164|geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anhnani sillo naui bosang eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
26|165|neohuineun ujuui modeun pijomul gaundeseo namseong-egeman jeobgeunhalyeo ha neunyo
26|166|hananimkkeseo neohuileul wihae changjohasin neohui baeujadeul-eul beolyeo du lyeo haneunyo sillo neohuineun hangyeleul neom eoseon baegseongdeul-ila
26|167|geudeul-i daedabhagil los-iyeo nega dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon neoneun chubang danghaneunja jung-e issge doelila
26|168|geuga daedabhadoe sillo naneun neohuiui haeng-wileul jung-ohanola
26|169|juyeo jeowa jeoui gajog-eul geu deul-i haenghaneun geos-eulobuteo guhayeo jusoseo
26|170|geulihayeo hananim-eun geuwa geuui gajog moduleul guwonhago
26|171|dwie nam-aissdeon neulg-eun han yeo ingwa
26|172|daleun jadeul-eul myeolmangke haessnola
26|173|geudeul oee dol ubag-eul peobu eoss-euni i dol ubag-eun gyeong-goleul geoyeog han baegseong-ege naelyeojin geos-ila
26|174|sillo i an-eneun hanaui ye jeung-i iss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hayeossdeola
26|175|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhanola
26|176|mediyan-ui baegseongdeuldo seonji jadeul-eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|177|syuaibeuga geudeul-ege mal haessdeola hananim-i dulyeobji anhneunyo
26|178|naneun sillo neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
26|179|hananim-eul dulyeowohago na-e ge sunjonghala
26|180|geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anhnani sillo naui bosang eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
